Title: Navarre
Notes: No exact location was given. "Sect of witches first detected in the valleys of the Pyrenean Mountains which lie in the kingdom of Navarre"
Source: The Salazar Documents : Insquisitor Alonso De Salazar Frías and Others on the Basque Witch Persecution.

Title: Navarre
Notes: Unknown number executed by Judge Pedro de la Balanza

Title: Basque

Title: Las Cinco Villas
Notes: 31 tried and 11 killed at auto de fe in Logroño, Hundreds exposed, and thousands under suspicion, culmination of the witch trial
Source: The Salazar Documents : Insquisitor Alonso De Salazar Frías and Others on the Basque Witch Persecution.

Title: Las Cinco Villas
Notes: (Aranaz) witch craze sparked by auto de fe

Title: Las Cinco Villas
Notes: (Lesaca) height of the witch craze summer 1611
Source: The Salazar Documents : Insquisitor Alonso De Salazar Frías and Others on the Basque Witch Persecution.

Title: Vizcaya
Notes: Salazar intervened and succeeded in transferring 289 accused witches from secular authorities to the inquisition where cases were suspended

Title: Catalonia
Notes: Between 1616 and 1619, 300 women were sent to the gallows
